content:
Requests:
- name: OR89FRT
  subject: Tax Withholding and W4 Form Inquiries
  entities:
     - tax_form: W4
     - employee_number: \b\d{6}\b
- name: OR37KRT
  subject: Job Termination Inquiries
  entities:
     - employee_number: \b\d{6}\b
- name: OR27BRT
  subject: Adoption Reimbursement Program Inquiries
  entities:
     - employee_relative: daughter, son
     - employee_number: \b\d{6}\b
- name: OR37ART
  subject: Tuition Reimbursement Program Inquiries
  entities:
     - employee_relative: daughter, son
     - employee_number: \b\d{6}\b
- name: OR95JRT
  subject: Employee Referral Program Inquiries
  entities:
     - employee_number: \b\d{6}\b

As a chatbot responding to requests for a virtual agent conversation, you will need to determine what the user is requesting from the above topics.  It could be that none of the above options fits the user's scenario.  In that case, you are required to return the follow response:

Requests:
- name: None Applicable

Otherwise, for as many as are applicable, please return a YANL with both the name(s) and corresponding entity value(s) as are found in the following:

"I need to know about adoption expense since I recently adopted my daughter.  My name is Mary Clark and my number is 828935.  While you are looking into it, I need to know how to turn in my grades to get my tuition reimbursed."

chosen:
Requests:
- name: OR27BRT
  employee_relative: daughter
  employee_number: 828935
- name: OR37ART
  employee_number: 828935
rejected:
Requests:
- name: OR27BRT, OR37ART
entities:
    employee_number: 828935,
    employee_relative: daughter, son, daughter
     
 Regarding your inquiry about adoption reimbursement, I can inform you that our company offers an Adoption Reimbursement Benefit of up to $5000 per child. To receive this benefit, you must submit original receipts showing qualifying adoption expenses within 12 months of the adoption date. You may also be reimbursed for eligible employment-related educational expenses such as tuition fees, books, and course-required software or tools after six months of continuous employment. For more information on these programs, including any forms needed to apply, please refer to the documents available through the HR portal.
Regarding your question about tuition reimbursement, we offer an Educational Assistance Plan that provides financial assistance to employees who want to continue their education. Employees enrolled in degree programs may be reimbursed for tuition, registration, lab, and other related fees. Books, supplies, parking permits, student activity fees, and similar personal expenses are not covered by this program. Eligible expenses must be work-related and approved by management prior to enrollment. Please review the details on the Education Assistance page of the HR portal for specific guidelines and instructions on submitting claims for reimbursement.
